notice-1: If you are translating this program please put your username on translation-author above, this message will not be seen inside PitCrew.
notice-2: Set to 1 below if your language goes right to left. It will auto-set to 0 if you don't include the rtl object below.
language-restart: Language will be applied properly on restart of PitCrew.
game-running: Your game is currently running, cannot continue.
tc2-warning: Modding The Crew 2 on Linux isn't supported. You have been warned.

filelist.priority-no-edit-before-path: You cannot edit the priority before the path.
conflictbox.default:
Add your game inside the Instances tab.
Double click the game in the list to select it.
conflictbox.no-mods:
Add your mods by dragging and dropping the zip files into the blue highlighted box.
Or by clicking Mods -> Import
conflictbox.no-conflicts: Remember to click Compile to apply your mods to the game.
modlist.packagemod.no-metadata:
Could not find proper metadata.
Please edit this mod.
modlist.packagemod.file-in-use:
The packaged mod trying to be overwritten is in use.
Please close the file.
modlist.packagemod.success:
Mod packaged for sharing at {0}.zip
View in explorer?

Are you sure you want to delete this?
The metadata and all mod files will be gone.

compiler.cannot-find-id: A mod has no ID associated with it.
compiler.conflict-in-original-file: {0} has a conflict with your current filesinfos.xml
compiler.no-startup-file: Could not find startup.dat or .fat in your data_win32 folder.
compiler.file-not-found: The file entered cannot be found.
compiler.no-global-db: No global_db files were found, cannot merge binaries.
compiler.forbid-databases: Modifying {0} directly could cause massive issues regarding save files, please only make your changes with babdb files.
compiler.too-many-ids: You have far too many ids loaded, only {0} will be inserted out of {1}.
compiler.no-attribute-in-root: Cannot find the file attribute inside the root of {0}.
